episodes.title: Ep.10: "Reverberations of Abuse"
episodes.description: In this special episode, we take a break from our usual storyline to delve deep into a critical and often overlooked topic: the long-lasting impact of mental and emotional abuse. Titled "Reverberations of Abuse," we explore the profound and enduring ways that abuse can shape an individual's life, influencing how they interact with the world and how their body responds to stress and trauma.Mental and emotional abuse can leave indelible marks on a person's psyche, often invisible but undeniably present. In this episode we discuss how survivors of emotional and mental abuse can experience difficulties in forming healthy relationships, trusting others, and managing their own emotions. It highlights the ways in which their self-esteem and self-worth can be deeply affected, impacting their overall quality of life.In addition, "Reverberations of Abuse" delves into the physiological effects of abuse, shedding light on the connection between mental and emotional trauma and long-term health issues. It explores the concept of toxic stress and how the body reacts to prolonged periods of fear, anxiety, and instability, potentially leading to a range of physical ailments.

episodes.title: Ep.9: "Demon Problems & Coming Catastrophe"
episodes.description: In this eye-opening episode of "The Cult Next Door", we delve into the intriguing world of the Worldwide Church of God (and it's offshoots) and their unique perspectives on mental health and the impending apocalypse. Join us as we unravel the fascinating history and beliefs of this religious organization in "Demon Problems & Coming Catastrophe."Unlike conventional approaches that seek to address mental health issues through medical and psychological means, the church viewed mental health challenges as manifestations of demonic oppression and possession. We explore the implications of this belief system and its impact on the lives of the church's followers, shedding light on the personal struggles they faced.The Church was known for its unwavering focus on the imminent arrival of the great tribulation and the end times. Our episode takes you on a journey through the church's teachings, which were steeped in apocalyptic fervor. We'll discuss the messages and prophecies that kept the followers on edge, believing that the end of the world was just around the corner."Demon Problems & Coming Catastrophe" offers a thought-provoking exploration of how a religious organization's unorthodox beliefs about mental health and doomsday scenarios can shape the lives of its adherents. Listen in as we navigate the complexities of faith, belief, and the human psyche in the face of impending catastrophe.

episodes.title: Ep.8: "Forty Days & Forty Nights"
episodes.description: Part 2: In this episode of "The Cult Next Door" we return to the gripping story of Mattie, the youngest child in a family plagued by a toxic cult-like dynamic. This time, we delve into a particularly harrowing chapter of his life, one that left a lasting scar on his psyche.At the tender age of 15, Mattie experienced a period of isolation, forced to spend "Forty Days & Forty Nights" away from his family, church, and friends. This extreme and psychologically damaging ordeal was orchestrated within the confines of the religious cult led by their father, shrouding Mattie's adolescence in darkness and despair.Joining Mattie in this deeply personal and revealing episode are his sisters, Jen and Ashleigh, the former providing crucial insights into the emotional and psychological torment they all endured during this time & the latter only learning of this ordeal recently.This episode continues to unravel the layers of dysfunction within their family and the oppressive grip of their father's religious cult. The narrative illustrates the profound impact of this forty-day ordeal on Mattie, who, at such a vulnerable age, grappled with an unfathomable degree of pain, fear, and uncertainty.Let’s get social!: https://linktr.ee/cultnextdoorpodcast We’d love to hear from you. Contact us at contact@thecultnextdoorpodcast.com #cult #igotout #cultsurvivor #familycult

episodes.title: Ep.7: "The Extra Child"
episodes.description: Part 1: In this episode of "The Cult Next Door" we begin to delve into the story of Mattie, the youngest child in a family ensnared by a cult-like dynamic, led by their own father. "The Extra Child" explores the painful journey of Mattie, who found himself thrust into the role of the family's new scapegoat, enduring the cruel and unjust treatment from his own father.Joining Mattie in this compelling narrative are his two sisters, Ashleigh and Jen, who provide essential insight into their shared experiences growing up in the shadow of their father's religious cult. Together, they share their memories, revealing the complex dynamics that engulfed their family, leaving them scarred and searching for answers.As we journey through their recollections, we uncover the layers of manipulation, control, and emotional abuse that permeated their lives. The episode sheds light on the psychological toll this family cult took on its youngest member, Mattie, as he grappled with isolation and mistreatment."The Extra Child" explores the complex dynamics within their family and the challenges they encountered along the way.Let’s get social!: https://linktr.ee/cultnextdoorpodcast We’d love to hear from you. Contact us at contact@thecultnextdoorpodcast.com #cult #igotout #cultsurvivor #familycult

episodes.title: Ep.6: "No One is Safe. No One."
episodes.description: Part 2: In this gripping and deeply personal episode of The Cult Next Door, hosts Mattie and Ashleigh are joined by a very special guest: their sister, Jen. Together, they open up about their shared experiences growing up in the shadow of a family cult and the heart-wrenching and lifelong ordeal of a Christian doomsday cult led by their own father. Join us as we delve into the harrowing world of cults and the profound impact they had on Mattie, Ashleigh, and Jen's lives. They'll recount their early memories, the seductive promises of the cult, and the chilling reality they eventually faced. This raw and emotional conversation sheds light on the hidden dangers of cults and the insidious role that narcissism can play in the rise of cult leaders. We explore the complex dynamics within their family and the challenges they encountered along the way. Let’s get social!: https://linktr.ee/cultnextdoorpodcast We’d love to hear from you. Contact us at contact@thecultnextdoorpodcast.com #cult #igotout #cultsurvivor #familycult
